Jason Derulo performs at the 2015 Isle of MTV event, from the stunning island setting of Malta.
MTV get to know rapidly rising rapstress, Doja Cat. Hear about what inspires her, see her in action, and understand how she made the transition from internet sensation to bona fide global superstar!
In between scoring number 1 hits and smashing global steaming records, this year's biggest breakthrough artist, Olivia Rodrigo, chats to MTV about her unstoppable rise to pop superstardom!

The first invitation into the life of an artist. From their homes and personal lives, to on the road experiences attesting to an uncensored reality, we see the moments of their life as it happens.

short_event_descriptor.name: My Life On MTV: Katy Perry &...

extended_event_descriptor.text: Nicki Minaj. Two words: Boss Ladies. Grab the karaoke machine and re-live some of the most iconic performances and moments that happened only on MTV. (S1, ep5)
No one saw the late 90's pop explosion coming but once these two future legends stepped on the TRL stage they quickly became family, and gave us some of the best pop moments in MTV history.
... Boys. Boy Band Alert! Two different eras of pop music. Two different eras of MTV.
Simple Plan perform a fantastic set at the MTV World Stage event at the Monterrey Arena in Mexico.
